name: Escape from the Dungeons of the Gods
overview: Along with several other rebels, you have been captured by the secret police of the evil and cruel King Safuis II. They have imprisoned you in a dismal prison cell in the legendary Dungeon of the Gods, while the king's forces continue to wreak destruction on the populace outside. You must escape to aid in the rebellion against the king's cruel tyranny. Legends say that somewhere within the dungeon Hes the Chest of the Gods which holds the power to destroy the king and his forces. This and several other treasures are said to be guarded by powerful monsters which must be slain in order to gain access to the treasures. Take courage, and may the blessings of the gods go with you!
